title: Rest Rank
body: I need my rank reset due to broken finger and i cant substain the level requite for my rank as diamond Would riot Reset the rank so i can still play tho i was once diamond 5

replies.body: Hey, sorry about your finger.  :(  It's not possible to reset your placement in the ladder.  It is only the preseason, though.  You'll be able to do do placement matches in the new season once it starts and place into a new division/tier.  Hoping for a swift recovery, friend!
